statements: UPDATE study_personalized_medicine SET genomic_data = '{"gene":"BRCA1","mutation":"c.5266dupC"}', clinical_data = '{"diagnosis":"Breast Cancer","treatment":"Chemotherapy"}' WHERE patient_id = 12345;
